p: At present, the combination of sulfonamide and pyrimethamine is considered the gold-standard therapy to treat toxoplasmosis [ 24]. According to the reports, these are associated with adverse side effects and responses such as teratogenic effects, hematological disorders, myelosuppression, and gastrointestinal effects, etc [ 5, 6]; hence, the discovery of novel effective agents especially from natural sources with low toxicities is an absolute need.
